amendment.description: Amendment allows for Title II funds to be used for restorative justice and conflict resolution training.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 18 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to allow for Title II funds to be used for restorative justice and conflict resolution training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Cohen.
